Posts.Content: Feb 15, 2016 01:57PM clevelandgirl wrote: Hi! I am new here( literally just joined today).... Been full of anxiety, as my doctors have me baffled. I just want to be around to watch my 1 and 3 year old little girls grow. I have been told my cancer is a "fluke" by my doctor. Then they throw all of these treatments and statistics at me . I just feel so lost.

Posts.Content: Sep 12, 2011 04:40PM clevelandgirl99 wrote: Thank you for words of encouragement.  I had the biopsy because my mri showed 2 7mm spots.  They biopsied one spot Friday and will montior the other.  I keep telling myself this is a huge waste of time and money.  I guess I would rather think that then to think I have cancer.  I think it's my way of convincing myself everything will be ok
